errors.validation-err-storage-partition-key-mis: Storage Partition Key was missing. Provide it.

errors.validation-err-acr-invalid: The value for Azure Container Registry name was invalid. It has to be alphanumeric.
errors.validation-err-acr-length: The value for Azure Container Registry name was invalid as it has to be between 5 and 50 characters long.
errors.validation-err-storage-key-vault-invalid: Storage Key Vault was invalid as it cannot only has dash and alphanumeric characters.
errors.validation-err-storage-key-vault-start-l: Storage Key Vault was invalid as it must start with a letter.
errors.validation-err-storage-key-vault-end-cha: Storage Key Vault was invalid as it must end with letter or digit.
errors.validation-err-storage-key-vault-hyphen: Storage Key Vault was invalid as it cannot contain consecutive hyphens.
errors.validation-err-storage-key-vault-length: Storage Key Vault was invalid as it has to be between 3 and 24 characters long.
